backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing challenge creation, user profiles, chat, storage mixins, authorization, and invitation logic with state maps and validation.

feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend recording-ID consistency update to affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files, used as reference for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Forwards to the main app stylesheet inside src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app controller handling auth state, challenge status, URL-synced navigation, invitation handling, and screen routing.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile-like container with scrollable content.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders multiline assignment text and bolds step headers like 'Step 1:' while preserving spacing.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Full-size login/logout button using Internet Identity with translated labels and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Compact icon-based login/logout button handling Internet Identity flow with loading icons and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically checks for a stored invitation and redeems it if the user has no active challenge, showing loading or error states as needed.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Displays a challenge chat interface with message sending, editing, replying, auto‑scrolling, and participant name resolution.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Shows a dismissible alert dialog informing the user that a challenge was deleted.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Renders a preview of the message being replied to, resolving sender names and fetching missing messages if needed.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: A developer-only panel showing auth info and allowing manual query refreshes.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two info popups triggered by buttons, using translations and shared popup layout.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Displays popup body content as a list of sections with optional headings and formatted text.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks app access until the user’s profile has a name, showing a form to save it if missing.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wraps a query and handles loading, error, and success states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: A shared dialog wrapper providing consistent sizing, scrolling, and trigger behavior for popups.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to toggle between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status, principal string, and identity from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and context provider using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge data, recordings, and chat messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference with localStorage persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the authenticated user's challenge status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides a translation context with a simple key-based lookup for English strings.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains the full English translation dictionary for multiple app screens and UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global layout settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.

frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utilities for reading, writing, and clearing screen/navigation state via URL search parameters.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines fixed assignment metadata and content for the 7‑day challenge.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: SessionStorage helpers for persisting and retrieving the active challenge ID.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using start time and day index into human‑readable strings.

frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, clears, and persists challenge invitation links and parameters using URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts day numbers between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) formats with clamping.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Normalizes recording day and assignment IDs, mapping legacy assignment IDs to canonical ones and validating identifiers.

frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, describing updated app scope and a list of existing implemented features with their descriptions, versions, and identifiers.
